review: It was OK but only took less then an hour. I don't recommend it just because of that.

A really intense racer. The mario kart of PC.  Graphics are top notch. Controls are as smooth as butter. This rollercoaster of a story will have you in tears by the end. The music puts Hans Zimmer to shame.
It's boring. It's overrated. It's dull.
Bad game. You can trust me. My play time is high
